DOC.brief_summary: The prevalence of ESBL Klebsiella pneumonia was higher in patient with renal replacement therapy.
DOC.brief_title: The Incidence of Extended-spectrum Î²-lactamase (ESBL) Klebsiella Pneumonia in Patient on Renal Replacement Therapy
DOC.criteria: The age of patient was between 18 yrs and 79 yrs. The patient who showed Klebsiella pneumonia in 1st culture result of any site during hospitalization The level of serum albumin was below 2.0 or over 5.0 The level of AST or ALT was 2 times of normal level or the level of bilirubin was over 2.0 mg/dL during 1month. The level of Body mass index was below 15 or over 30 Pregnancy
